name: National Association For The Blinds (Employment & Training)- Manesar

address: IMT Manesar Near Maruti Gate No.3

briefDescription: 1. Training and skill development of visually challenged, handicapped and disadvantaged. 2. Special focus on skill building and capacity building of the girl child. 3. Focus age group is between 18-35 years. 4. Special trainers and volunteers from leading institutes impart sector based training to impart industry specific job role training. 5. Outstation trainees are Rehabilitated to Gurgaon and we seek their employment in the industrial vicinity of Delhi/NCR. 6. We have been able to skill train over 1500 people and created employment for over 70% of our beneficiaries . 7. Focus is to cater to a concentrated batch rather than huge numbers.
